 java.lang.Object onMessage(java.lang.Object callingConnector, java.lang.Object message)
          The EIS/Connector wants to push a message to the application server Notes: The EIS/Connector must implement XAResource Calls to this method may be made by multiple threads Implementation of the message is application specific Whether this method should return an actual object is also implemenatation specific

                                               throws XtentisConnectorException
Called by the Application server to start the EIS/Connector using the MappedRecord parameters as configuration

Parameters:
recordIn - - the parameters to use to start the connector
Returns:
a MappedRecord containing a status and message
Throws:
XtentisConnectorException

startFromConfiguration

javax.resource.cci.MappedRecord startFromConfiguration(javax.resource.cci.MappedRecord recordIn)
                                                       throws XtentisConnectorException
Called by the Application server to start/restart the EIS/Connector based on the saved configuration Some additional parameters may be passed in the MappedRecord This method is typically called at the end of the Application Server start/restart

Parameters:
recordIn - - optional additional parameters used to start the connector
Returns:
a MappedRecord containing a status and message
Throws:
XtentisConnectorException

onMessage

java.lang.Object onMessage(java.lang.Object callingConnector,
                           java.lang.Object message)
                           throws XtentisConnectorException
The EIS/Connector wants to push a message to the application server Notes: The EIS/Connector must implement XAResource Calls to this method may be made by multiple threads Implementation of the message is application specific Whether this method should return an actual object is also implemenatation specific

Parameters:
callingConnector - the calling Connector/EIS
message - the actual message
Returns:
a message or null, as expected
Throws:
XtentisConnectorException
